content.description: Sit start under a plethora of holds and trend left to climb over the lip of the boulder for a super positive grade slab finish!  Look for the little nubs!
content.location: If you're standing at 89, walk around the left side of the boulder and walk a few yards uphill.  Also uphill a 30 second's jaunt from Iron Bridge.

content.description: Sit start on the meaty sloper and left heel. Head upwards for the cracks between the layers of the rock.  The end is a niceish jug about midway up the face. This route DOES NOT top out - simply match hands for the send.
content.protection: Crash pads.  PG13 due to some broken glass so please don't go bear foot!
content.location: See directions on how to get to the boulder. This problem in on the face where there is (unfortunately) graffiti "89".

content.description: Up for a few slopers?  Maybe some pinches?  Then check these out! These problems are more high maintenance than most and may need some brushing near the middles and tops.
